testcase.name: To verify Add Place API
testcase.system-out: Given Configure Excel Data "PlaceTestData"..................................passed Given Configure "Add Place" Request payload with excel data.................passed When user calls "AddPlaceRequest" with "POST" HTTP Request..................passed Then verify the status code is 200..........................................passed And "status" is "OK" in response body......................................passed When user calls "GetPlaceRequest" with "GET" HTTP Request...................passed Then verify "name" in response body equals "name" passed in add request.....passed
